title: Развод
overview: Well-known journalist Roman holds the column in one of the most popular magazines. One day, the theme of his article is family life. Moreover, it's his own one. When Roman's wife Natalya read the article, she was so disheartened and upset that she immediately filed for divorce. This is what an amazing whirl of events begins with — young people can not find a way to make peace, they parcel their property, children, completely forgetting about how much they shared over the years.
